Ruby on Rails developer in GR

Submitted by Anonymous (not verified) on Thu, 03/29/2012 - 22:25

Hi everyone,

We are looking for another full-time Ruby on Rails developer at ProTrainings.com. Required skills include Ruby on Rails, JavaScript/jQuery, HTML, CSS, and some aptitude for UI design on the web. This is a full time position for someone who is excited to work with a small team at a rapidly growing company.

Anyone interested should email their resume to scott@procpr.org.
